name: Monsty Corp: The Prequels
storyline: Monsty Corp is an advanced science facility in the middle of the Australian desert, Maria, a new member of the Practical AI Division, has been tasked with activating and debugging a new AI called "Sentient Artificial and Intelligent Consciousness". Little does she know, this AI will be more then she bargained for.
summary: Monsty Corp is an advanced science facility in the middle of the Australian desert, Maria, a new member of the Practical AI Division, has been tasked with activating a new AI called "Sentient Artificial and Intelligent Consciousness".
